Valvan.title: Irreversible Hearing Damage (Read Description)
Valvan.about:
This album is NOT MEANT TO BE LISTENED TO FOR MORE THAN TWENTY SECONDS AT A TIME
This is an experiment in harshness, with the goal being to make the harshest noise possible. PLEASE TURN THE VOLUME DOWN.
